title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: From renowned creator Vince Gilligan, this Apple TV+ drama boasts an excellent 87 Metacritic score and an 8.6 IMDb rating with over 26K votes, indicating strong critical and audience reception.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45K votes, this HBO series features major star Mark Ruffalo and comes from 'Mare of Easttown' creator Brad Ingelsby.
